Related repos

  • Observability tool for LLM applications
  • Japanese morphological analyzer written in pure Go
  • structured prompt templates for LLMs, like programming for prompts
  • builds LLM apps with modular components
  • Curated resources and tools for building, fine-tuning, and deploying large language models
  • Code for large-scale depth-recurrent language model training
  • Build and run LLM agents via terminal CLI
  • bilingual web translator extension and userscript
  • Trains language models to generate self-edits via reinforcement learning
